data.title: Our Unique Location
meta_keywords: Boutique Hotel. Alfama. Santa Luzia Miradouro
data.meta_description: Hotel Santiago de Alfama is located on Rua de Santiago in the wonderfully nostalgic district of Alfama, immediatley below Saint Georges Castle and above the famous view point, Miradouro de Santa Luzia.
data.text:
Nearby Points of Interest

Hotel Santiago de Alfama is located on Rua de Santiago in the wonderfully nostalgic district of Alfama, immediately below Saint Georges Castle and above the famous viewpoint, Miradouro de Santa Luzia. Alfama is Lisbon's fado district, this music is part of the fabric of this neighbourhood if you listen carefully you will hear the strum of a mandoline coming from an open window, a fado singer coming down a cobbled street.

it's pretty narrow streets date back millennia, some so old that the buildings lean to meet each other, secrets whisper from their ancient walls.

Visit: Museu de Teatro Romano - Roman Theatre Museum; Sé de Lisboa (Lisbon Cathedral); St Georges Castle; Miradouro de Santa Luzia; Miradouro Portas do Sol; The Fado Musuem and the Tile Museum; Casa dos Bicos; Feira de Ladra - twice weekly outdoor street market; Praça de Comercio; The Baixa area and Rua de Augusta and up to the Chiado district.

Tram 28 stops 50 meters from the front door.

Get directions
